original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2096)@</color>對前方扇形區域衝出一片水浪，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2096)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2096)@</color> rushed a wave of water to the fan-shaped area in front, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int (2096)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on the enemy.
